summary: The module provides neighbor sampling utilities for graph neural network training, constructing multi‑layer message‑passing subgraphs. It includes a sampler that expands all neighbors at each layer for full‑neighbor aggregation and a generic neighbor sampler supporting configurable sampling strategies.
business_intent: Enable scalable and efficient mini‑batch training of GNN models by dynamically generating per‑layer subgraphs, reducing memory consumption and simplifying data loading pipelines.
